title: Silken Slavery
description: Chris is a thirty-year-old transvestite, firmly 'in the closet', who yearns for understanding female company. When his inner life is accidentally discovered, however, he finds his work colleagues more accommodating than he might have thought, and embarks on an odessey into willing she-male submission and enforced feminization. A tale of kinky cross-dressing and sexual fulfillment from the author of The Last Straw .
author: Christina Shelly
